website_summaries.verdict: Realistic looking doe decoy that fools the bucks.
pros: All the pieces fit inside the body of the decoy for easy transport
Very realistic, particularly in wooded settings
Lightweight and easy to set up
cons: This is a hard painted plastic decoy

customer_reviews.title: Chased my deer away.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t wait to get out and try this doe at my hunting place. Within 20 minutes a nice buck came towards me and saw the doe decoy about 40 feet away. He looked at it and ran off. About 30 minutes later another buck came and did the same. Then a doe came and stared at it and ran off. About 2 hours later a spike came, saw it and ran off. I’m not bringing back to that spot again. I give it 3 stars because it looks great and should work.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Stops them in their tracks
customer_reviews.text: Second year using this decoy and I can say without a doubt if it’s near the time of the rut and the bucks are cruising this decoy will make them stop in their tracks. I hunt long lanes and when one passes through this decoy gives me the time I need to get on the buck and place a good shot.
customer_reviews.author: MyAllegory

customer_reviews.title: Best decoy made!
customer_reviews.text: Great decoy!!! Yes, the legs attach in a strange way but with a little practice before getting in the field, it's no problem. It's light weight and easy to carry. Whoever said it's heavy needs to start working out. I added the mechanical tail by Primos and WOW!!! Makes me want to date her! It came with two sets of ears to change it up a bit. To make it easier, I drilled a few holes and added paracord to keep track of the pieces. I love this thing!!!
customer_reviews.author: David B. Weathers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Went together easily, nice size, my wife had 3 doe around it opening morning, very happy with the purchase. We put a burlap tarp over it when we are not using it, so we can leave it by her stand. My wife took a bucket of scent laundry soap and hot water to it, wiping out the inside and outside, left it outside for about a week,prior to opener. My only complaint is the neck area isn't a perfect fit, everything else is. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Goff

customer_reviews.title: Hot doe
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! The head and legs fit the body perfect and has a plastic nut to hold all 4 legs on. I read some reviews about legs being loose and not stable but they fixed it.Stands up strait. Only fault I found is my doe had to much white on her neck and chest but I will paint and fix her for here in South central Kentucky. Will update about how she does with the bucks here in November 2017
customer_reviews.author: Chadpoe

customer_reviews.title: Decent decoy
customer_reviews.text: Looks real but the legs cannot be completely secured. It is a nice concept to use the body cavity to store parts for ease of carry, but there is no padding inside the cavity which creates a lot of noise! Will be using it this weekend
customer_reviews.author: Lei

customer_reviews.title: Great product easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: Very realistic and easy set up. I usually set it up and carry it over my shoulder to the stand. It is light weight and looks great. I added a primos tail wager for even more realism. The little bit of movement really helps. You can also tape a piece of toilet paper to the butt and that works great too.
customer_reviews.author: BillyRay

customer_reviews.title: Don't look real , heavy , scares deer
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, scared the deer away , to light color and get the feeding one if you get one , plastic s screws in legs they fall off , I'm sending back
customer_reviews.author: Gk

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to paint!
customer_reviews.text: Legs fit snugly, will need a serious paint job as it is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: lnu238

customer_reviews.title: He's happy.
customer_reviews.text: My husband says other deer come to investigate, so it does work to draw others in. He has used it twice in the house to scare me. It looks realistic and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: ann h.

customer_reviews.title: Very real! Bucks love her
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm! Pre rut had a huge buck come in on a string
customer_reviews.author: Manny C

customer_reviews.title: It might be useful for someone who doesn't have lots of deer in ...
customer_reviews.text: This decoy seemed to scare most of our deer away. It might be useful for someone who doesn't have lots of deer in the area. But, since we have a lot of "live" decoys, this decoy did more harm than good.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Hubby and I get such a kick watching our local ...
customer_reviews.text: Hubby and I get such a kick watching our local bucks try to romance our Flambeau Masters doe deer decoy. We add Tinks #69 sent bomb to it's legs and she's a real killer.
customer_reviews.author: TempestScout

customer_reviews.title: Must for hunters
customer_reviews.text: Brought a buck in the first morning I used it!
customer_reviews.author: Monica church

customer_reviews.title: Nice 25 yard double lung shot and it only went ...
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant paying big bucks for a decoy, but I have to tell you... it works! First hunt, I called in a 6 point buck and it never took it's eyes off the decoy. Nice 25 yard double lung shot and it only went about 50 yards. Put a good quality doe in heat scent, set it up (face to the wind) downwind of your stand and be ready for action!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D

customer_reviews.title: Flambeau outdoor deer decoy is perfect
customer_reviews.text: The only bad thing I have to say is that the box had been opened possibly before shipping. It was not sealed very well. There were no parts missing, or I would have been very upset. We would not have had it to be used this deer season. The decoy is great, we have another like it.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Folsom

customer_reviews.title: All around Cheaply made product.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Mine had a problem with ear not going on head.
customer_reviews.author: Pickle

customer_reviews.title: Also the shipping time was great.
customer_reviews.text: Had read reviews that talked about how hard this was to put together, I'm not sure how it could have went together any easier. It was a simple as it was possibly have been. Also the shipping time was great.
customer_reviews.author: Dee A.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than expected. Looks great from the tree stand.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Surprised and curious deer
customer_reviews.text: Here I sit in my hunting blind. I got this decoy because it had good reviews, first off as you can see in the attached photo, her head is tilted. No matter what I do, I can't get it to sit on straight. Second her rear leg keeps falling off. Deer key in on body language and this deer just seems confused and looking at something in the distance strangely. Also, the plug it came with so you can carry it, doesn't stay in. So I lost an ear while walking to my blind and had to look for it in the dark
customer_reviews.author: J. Browne

customer_reviews.title: Gets their attention
customer_reviews.text: I’ve have used this two mornings now in late October in Iowa. I’ve had three deer that would have normally passed through that have gone out of their way to check out the decoy. It has presented several broadside shots. I’ve used dander scent along with it. Overall very impressed by the way the deer seem so intrigued by it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built decoy. I have been very happy with it. I added an automated tale to it and that really topped it off. The only downside to the decoy is that it is noisy to move and awkward to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Looks really real and great price also
customer_reviews.text: This thing is very durable and looks real for a great price
customer_reviews.author: MISSY

customer_reviews.title: Durability and fit are issues
customer_reviews.text: The leg mounting system is flimsy and does not lock into place easily; ditto on the ears. Did not come with stakes to secure deer to the ground. A light wind knocks the decoy over easily. I had to make my own stakes with coat hanger wire to keep the decoy upright.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: She's Hot.
customer_reviews.text: Notice all five stars eh? Well she deserves it-- she aided in me shooting the biggest deer of my life. I put her out --20 yards-quartering away-- with Tinks 69 behind her hind legs. Cruising buck came RIGHT in was very interested in her, and I took my shot on a deer that I don't know that I would have ever seen- if this Doe-coy wasn't out in the field with me. Trust me decoying helps a lot, but other doe's don't seem to find her inviting FYI-- Good Luck!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Reed

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a pretty good decoy other than the head can’t go on correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but legs are horrible
customer_reviews.text: This deer looks really nice and I want to love it but the legs are the biggest POS on the planet. A five year old could come up with a better design. I used screws to attach them like another poster recommended but it’s sad you have to do that. They just fall off if you don’t.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very realistic and easy to setup. Wish it came with a bag though.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C. Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good overall decoy. During rut I got pictures of a decent buck trying to mount this decoy.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on-time and made a really great present for my son, an avid deer hunter!
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Millwee

customer_reviews.title: Best looking decoy !
customer_reviews.text: Great decoy, extremely realistic, very sturdy while in use, even on windy days in a bean field she stays up. The only issue I have is that the leg attachments caps or plastic nuts, are pretty cheap, and requires tighten after each hunt. All in all im very pleased with this product. I ended up adding antlers to it ( Diy ) now I can easily switch from doe to buck, beats spending $ 160 on a buck decoy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Back Leg Issue
customer_reviews.text: The back left leg doesn’t fit right, has some space and doesn’t sit right.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Be ready.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Shot a nice buck with my crossbow the first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: michael enoch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks real good price see what happens in hunting season
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband, he and the deer love this babe! It gives you an easy way to carry to the field and easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good product to try decoying
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well manufactured. Finish is quite detailed. I can't rate the effectiveness yet due to limited opportunity to try it in 2013.
customer_reviews.author: Grampy in Ionia

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in the field
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in the field. A buck came right up to it the first time I used it. The legs are a little wobbly but still work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nova66

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The biggest buck I ever saw came looking for "Suzie". I wish I wouldn't have missed it.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Duplantis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the field.
customer_reviews.text: This decoy is light weight and takes less than a minute to set up in the field. Since using with a call I've brought in many bucks and does. My 12 point buck I took in the 2014 rut even tried to mount it. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I love the decoy. The first time I used it I got a doe!. The deer were all over this decoy. WOW!!.
customer_reviews.author: I.m. Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: bought them because of the great reviews on them
customer_reviews.text: Ok, here's the deal on these, I paid quite a bit for these, bought them because of the great reviews on them, had them for awhile and I like to use things awhile before I rate them to give honost opinions on things, here goes!, I have tried them for two seasons now, they look excellent, but I truely believe they are too big for the south, I've tried them in many situations and find that I just have better luck not using them at all, make nice lawn ornaments tho, I have had deer come within eye distance, but as soon as real deer see them, they bolt before I can get a shot. But for looks, 3.
customer_reviews.author: Michael l. Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Small nuts
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad decoy for the price the nut that holds the legs on are almost as small as the hole itself not. Doesn't hold legs on very well therefore it will probably break after it blows over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap construction
customer_reviews.text: Got this yesterday, the legs won't stay in, the wholes are to big. Don't bother buying. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased. Mind came with two right ears
customer_reviews.text: For the sale price of $41 dollars, I'm very pleased. Mind came with two right ears. Flambeau shipped me a left ear. I added some acrylic paint features to make face more realistic.
customer_reviews.author: Seezer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: killed a nice buck the first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: BILL D.

customer_reviews.title: easy to pack up and not noisy to carry through ...
customer_reviews.text: Very light, easy to pack up and not noisy to carry through the woods. I put a couple staps throught the leg holes and easily carried it on my backpack forgetting it was there.
customer_reviews.author: R.Mal

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy great looking decoy!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the other half, he loves it! looks great, very sturdy. We actually had it outside with Xmas lights during Christmas and it never blew over! Almost lost a ear hauling it to the stand, would advise being careful if you haul all the parts in the body. We just put the ears in pockets and the rest of the parts stay inside while carrying. Would buy another if we needed one!
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Looks real
customer_reviews.text: Perfect price, shipped fast. Deer Doe Decoy looks so real too. Easily assembled. Love that all fits compactly inside body for transportation.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great
customer_reviews.text: I let it air out for about 3 days in my back yard. It fooled my dogs because they could not stop barking at it.By day 4 my son woke me up at 7;00 AM And told me to take a look at the deer decoy. As I looked out the window in the back yard there were 3 doe's checking out my decoy. They stayed about 3 to 4 feet away from the decoy. Then walked away.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I bought both this one and the grazing doe decoy. we had a small buck approaching right away. on about the fourth use my husband was laying in some brush in a tree line and had a 11 point buck walk up to with 10 feet of him, it was so focused on the decoys it never saw him, he got a great shot off, and we got 110 pounds of meat from that buck. Was well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: tigress6981

customer_reviews.title: Loud set up/works though
customer_reviews.text: I've had deer check it out. It's fun to watch. Very loud plastic. If it was quieter softer plastic I would rate it higher.
customer_reviews.author: NIKO

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made better than the doe I ordered at the same time but still a tad flimsey
customer_reviews.author: jim mounts

customer_reviews.title: Very realistic......but the leg design is aweful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this decoy fall, 2011. It looks awesome, but it all goes down hill after that. The legs pop off at the slightest bit of torque (I really mean slightest too). I am serious. I can't believe these decoys have been around as long as they have and that's the best they can do. VERY DISAPPOINTED and for the amount of money, they are not worth it! I would not recommend this decoy until they come up with a better design for the legs on!!!!
customer_reviews.author: thedecoyguy

customer_reviews.title: Life-like
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and lifelike. Works well bringing in other deer. So realistic looking it startled our neighbors which was a little funny.
customer_reviews.author: Necole S

customer_reviews.title: Doe Deer Decoy is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband and he is thrilled and sayes it will do the trick. as for me the deers must be blind
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice light weight and real looking.
customer_reviews.text: Nice doe decoy very light weigh and looks ready to walk. All parts fit into body and set up is a breeze. I already used it in bow hunting so far and must say it will bring in any deer that spots it.
customer_reviews.author: George N Aronis

customer_reviews.title: REAL??
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use the decoy only once at the end of the season. Boy did it look REAL! The detail and workmanship is fantastic. I had no problem with assembly. Be sure to stake out the decoy if the wind is blowing - I found this out the hard way. Again this decoy is so real, I was afraid to leave it in the field without beeing there because I was sure someone would take a shot at it!
customer_reviews.author: Big Mel in Al

customer_reviews.title: Very loud, poor customer service.
customer_reviews.text: This is made of hollow plastic so it is very loud early in the morning to set up. The left rear leg doesn't stay connected on the decoy because the nut is too short. I tried to email customer service for a new one and got no response. Will not buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fits together perfectly and looks great! Flambeau seems to have redesigned the way the head and legs attach. Extra set of ears give this decoy a two different looks.
customer_reviews.author: Gramps

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: pain getting it in woods it need a carrying case, noisy in woods hard plastic but looks real
customer_reviews.author: Henry K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Decoy
customer_reviews.text: Very realistic-can't wait to use it hunting this fall. Easy to set up- very compact-easy to transport.The best doe decoy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Shadow Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice, but heavier than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice, but heavier than anticipated..with a bow in my hand and a climbing stand on my back there is no room for the decoy. The legs could use a bit of modification. When fit to body they do not fit flush, there is some rocking when secured with cap nut. And a couple legs there wasn't enough protrusion into body cavity there was hardly one turn on the cap nut to secure them and one popped off. I will be returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Sets up easily, brings in the bucks! This was my Second purchase on this decoy it worked so well. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: BoomerX

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Doe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this doe to go with the buck we have in our nature area of our back yard. She is very life like and easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Garriss

customer_reviews.title: Doe decoy
customer_reviews.text: The decoy arrived on time as scheduled. The assembly of the legs leaves room for Improvement. One of the legs pulled right through the decoys body.. They should have a large collared nut to secure the legs. The Decoy does look real but I haven't tried it yet for hunting
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: be ready here they come
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping from seller :) and this doe works great it will bring them right to you the onlything is you have to watch is you shooting them before they get to her
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: doe decoy
customer_reviews.text: pretty nice, rear legs are a little on the wobbly side though. all in all a pretty nice looking decoy though
customer_reviews.author: Brad Puryear

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to try it
customer_reviews.text: Looks realistic enough, packs up well. be careful with legs don't stress them too much. Should be lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: amanda reese

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to keep the legs in place and I plan on gluing them in as I don't have to worry about carrying it to my food plot, very realistic looking and I added a mechanical tail for more realism.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for hunting last season. Picture doesn't show but the legs are not attached to the body as one piece they are remove able and the leg holes are so big the legs keep following off . This is the biggest piece of junk I ever bought off AMAZON. Now I know how it is I won't pay 5 dollars for it
customer_reviews.author: Tammy S.

product_meta.title: Flambeau Outdoors 5965MD Boss Babe - Masters Series Deer Decoy
product_meta.description: Based on a carving by award winning sculptor Chris Schiller, the Boss Babe is a buck magnet. Featuring a sturdy, ultra-realistic posture and true-to-life size, rutting bucks—from little baskets to chandelier Booners—come running to investigate and will even circle and mount. The Boss Babe can be used alone or as the perfect compliment to the Boss Buck to simulate a peak of the rut courtship.
feature_bullets: FIELD-PROVEN: Durable, 3-D blow molded HDPE plastic deer decoy with ultra-realistic detail for luring in whitetail deer

ULTRA-REALISTIC HUNTING DECOY: The anatomically correct posture and true-to-life size of a 1.5 year-old doe causes bucks—from little baskets to chandelier Booners—to come running to investigate, especially during the rut.
COLLAPSIBLE & PORTABLE: Features a removable leg design that allows the legs to fit conveniently in the body cavity for easy transportation or storage. Heavy-duty threaded leg posts and locking lugs.
DETAILS & FEATURES: Includes two sets of ears - submissive and alert. Peg on rear leg allows for the attachment of scent pads.
Decoy Dimensions - Nose to tail: 41" / Tip of ear to ground: 44" / Body width at widest point: 11.5" / Shoulder to ground: 32"
Limbs, head and ears break down quickly and can be stored inside the body cavity for easy transport
Secure plug provided for the head hole so that parts don't fall out during transport
Features two separate sets of ears to change the attitude of the decoy. One set simulates alert and the other simulates a submissive doe
Rear leg designed to accept readily available scent pads using Flambeau's scent management system
Secure leg attachment system features a large diameter screw cap to lock down each leg from inside the body
